title: Sophisticated Fairmont Stay in the Heart of Washington, DC
description: Discover the many charms of the US capital from an elegant launchpad, The Fairmont Washington, DC Georgetown, an urban oasis located in the fashionable West End district. Explore the city by day and unwind in a chic Fairmont King Room with daily breakfast, a US$50 hotel credit, complimentary access to the impressive Balance Gym and complimentary Wi-Fi during your stay.
offer_address: 2401 M St NW, Washington, DC 20037, United States

title: Bold Washington DC Art Hotel near Logan Circle with Rooftop Pool
description:
Leave ordinary at the door the moment you enter Hotel Zena, A Viceroy Urban Retreat in Washington DC, a ‘herstory’-defining hotel located on vibrant 14th Street, near Logan Circle. In an area already buzzing with renowned chef-helmed restaurants and stylish bars, this eclectic hotel is poised to spark conversation. Its powerful 8,000-piece art collection, simply titled ‘Her’, guarantees it.

Enter and be blown away by thought-provoking art that leaves room for contemplation, luxurious settings that invite relaxation and a location that affords easy access to DC’s most storied and iconic locations. Discover U Street, The White House and thriving Logan Circle, packed with shops, galleries and distilleries, then return to the hotel and enjoy craft cocktails with a modern twist at Figleaf Bar & Lounge or Hedy's Rooftop (seasonal), where a pool and bar await.
location_description: Hotel Zena, A Viceroy Urban Retreat
offer_address: 1155 14th St NW, Washington, DC 20005, United States
